page.title: 16Evening
page.content: AT 5:30 I have my tea which is ham and salad on Wednesday.At 5:45 I get changed for Brownies and at 5:50 I go round to the School on my bike.Brown Owl who is our Leader arrives at 6:00.We play Games like Mr Ramsbottom and make things.We have packs of six children.We name them Elves,Pixies ,Imps and Gnomes.I'm in the Gnomes and I'm second in charge.Claire Reynold is the Sixer.At seven thirty it finishs and we go home. At about 7:45 some of the older boys come and play cricket or football.I nearly always join in but sometimes I play hide and seek. Later I have to go and feed the dog which is a Scottish Terrier.We feed him on "Chappie" which is prepared tinned food.After I have fed him I go out to play again.At 9:00 our dad calls us in and we go to bed at 9:45 PM
